about_the_game:
Meet the only DLC content that can make the original BoneTown look tame: the BoneTown Kinks DLC.

Do you only want just the Straight sex from the Kinks DLC? Then the Kinks Straight DLC is perfect thing for you. This DLC only includes the new straight sex, characters, levels, and competitions, and none of the other stuff.



The new Threesome Mode allows you to pick up two people at once, and have sex with both of them. Have you dreamed of a threesome with a sorority girl and a stoner? How about a party girl and a punk? The choices are endless.



Four new Gangbang sex positions will allow you to bone a girl with your best bud. Any girl you pick up can now be tag-teamed with these 4 new sex positions: Gangbang Dicksuck, Split the Silk, Threeway, and the Wobbly H.



The new Creampie Mode will allow you to change the orgasm of five existing sex positions to a Creampie orgasm. Watch any girl in the game squeeze back out what you gave her.



Explore and compete in a gym turned night club that is full of nothing but Big Beautiful Women.



Turn on Pregnant mode and have hot mamas-to-be turn up all over the game for your personal enjoyment.



Now when you strip down a girl in BoneTown, you have a chance of finding a sexy surprise: some girls are now wearing racy lingerie under their outfits.



Gain access to nine new straight sex positions: Hand-job, Titty Fuck, Foot-job, Ass-licking, Fisting, Solo Dildo Butt, Reverse Cowgirl, Tabletop Sex, and Spooning.



On top of the four threesome sex positions already available in the game (Scissoring, Dildo-ing, Against the Wall, and Doggy), there will now be four new ones: the Train, Face and Cock Ride, Side by Side, and Side by Side Anal.



Five new interior levels are the hubs for the new kinks:

  • Cream of the Crop Creampie Shop
  • Five Dudes - Gangbangs and Burgers
  • Planet Fill This Gym
  • Bone U. Medical Center Hospital
  • The Gore House BDSM Club



7 new Competitions will not only highlight all the new kinks, but also unlock some of the new sexual positions.



With the new interiors come 3 new character types: Gym People, Pregnant Girls and BDSM Participants.



The Kinks DLC is first time we’ve exposed all the clothing, voices, hair, body sizes, lingerie, dicks, and everything else that makes up our characters in single, easy to use places. But . . . this is a video game, so gaining access to all that great content’s got to be earned. You’ll unlock more options in each one of these customizers by completing the original game’s story-line as well as the new Kinks competitions.



Make your main character just how you want him. A stoner blinged out in gangster attire? A crackhead in a business suit with his dick hanging out? We don’t judge, it’s up to you.



This is the place where you can go wild crafting the girl who’s just right for you. A black girl who sounds like she’s Asian? A schoolgirl trapped in a BDSM body? The heart desires what the heart desires.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC includes explicit sex between a man and a woman in multiple positions, doing explicit things with ejaculate, as well as sex with a pregnant woman. None of the content is hidden and you are able to see everything.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.8 GHz or AMD Athlon 2800+
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card supporting Pixel Shader 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 1GB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support (Nvidia GeForce GTX 560+ or ATI Radeon 6950+)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Experience all new types of Straight sex. Threesomes, gangbangs, creampies, and pregnant are only the beginning, with a large chunk of new straight sex positions, character customizers, and more.
